      class  MSStateInfoDrawer
      This is a drawer that can display the information of a state with a Muller-Schupp tree.

    • Uses of Drawer in org.svvrl.goal.core.draw

      Classes in org.svvrl.goal.core.draw that implement Drawer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDrawer
      This class provides a default implementation of the Drawer interface.
      class  AltAutomatonDrawer
      This class provides an implementation of drawing alternating automata.
      class  AutomatonDrawer<T extends Automaton>
      This class provides methods for drawing a general automaton.
      class  EditableDrawer<T extends Editable>
      An EditableDrawer is a drawer capable of drawing a class of editable object.
      class  FormulaDrawer<T extends Logic>
      This is a drawer for logic formulae.
      class  FSADrawer
      This class provides an implementation of drawing finite state automata.
      class  GameDrawer
      This class provides an implementation of drawing games.
      class  GridlinesDrawer
      This class provides a drawer that draws grid lines in the visible area.
      class  IdleDrawer<T>
      This is an abstract drawer that draws information about an object at a suggested location within a specific visible area when the cursor stops on the object for a while.
      class  StateInfoDrawer
      This is a drawer that can display the information of a state.
      class  TextTree
      This class provides an implementation of Tree.
      class  TwoWayAltAutomatonDrawer
      This class provides an implementation of drawing two-way alternating automata.

    • Uses of Drawer in org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor

      Classes in org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor that implement Drawer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  AutomatonCanvas.MyIdleDrawer
      This is a drawer that can paint information about the state under the mouse cursor when the mouse is idle.
      Methods in org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor that return Drawer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Drawer[] AutomatonCanvas.getDrawers()
      Returns all drawers in this automaton canvas.
      Methods in org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor with parameters of type Drawer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AutomatonCanvas.addDrawer(Drawer drawer)
      Inserts a drawer that wants to draw something on this automaton canvas.
      void AutomatonCanvas.removeDrawer(Drawer drawer)
      Removes a drawer from this automaton canvas.

    • Uses of Drawer in org.svvrl.goal.gui.tool

      Classes in org.svvrl.goal.gui.tool that implement Drawer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractControllerTool<T extends Automaton>
      An AbstractControllerTool is the abstraction of tools controlling a controllable algorithm.
      class  AbstractStateTool<T extends Automaton>
      An AbstractStateTool is the abstraction of tools that create states.
      class  AbstractTransitionTool<T extends Automaton>
      An AbstractTransitionTool is the abstraction of tools that create transitions.
      class  AccTool
      An AccTool is a tool for editing an acceptance condition.
      class  AltConnectorTool
      This is a tool for creating alternating connectors.
      class  AltStateTool
      This is a tool for creating alternating states.
      class  AltTransitionTool
      A AltTransitionTool is a tool for creating transitions in an alternating automaton.
      class  AutomatonTool<T extends Automaton>
      An AutomatonTool is an abstraction of tool intended to operate on automata.
      class  ColoringTool 
      class  DeleteTool
      A DeleteTool is a tool that can delete states or transitions.
      class  FocusStateTool
      A FocusStateTool helps the user focus on a state and its neighbors by making other components transparent.
      class  FSAStateTool
      An FSAStateTool can create states for finite state automata.
      class  FSATransitionTool
      A FSATransitionTool is a tool for creating transitions in a FSA.
      class  GamePlayer0StateTool
      A GamePlayer0StateTool can create states in a gram graph for the player 0.
      class  GamePlayer1StateTool
      A GamePlayer1StateTool can create states in a gram graph for the player 1.
      class  GameTransitionTool
      A GameTransitionTool is a tool that can create transitions in a game graph.
      class  NextStageTool
      A NextStageTool can make the controllable algorithm in the active editor perform steps until the next stage.
      class  NextStepTool
      A NextStepTool can make the controllable algorithm in the active editor perform the next step.
      class  SelectTool
      A SelectTool is a tool that can select and move states and transitions.
      class  StartPlayTool
      A StartPlayTool can make the controllable algorithm in the active editor perform the rest steps automatically.
      class  StopPlayTool 
      class  TestTool
      This is a tool for debugging only.
      class  TwoWayAltTransitionTool
